name: Retro Escape (Petipois)
description:
Retro Escape

Escape room experience created for the VR Jan Jam. Inspired by my childhood memories of cartoons, movies and playing games on a brick-style PC this short experience is a vertical slice of a bigger game idea.

You start in a time period and have to use the objects around  you to find the key to the next room.  I had some issue with time and the UI, so the level is not polishd as I would like but I wanted to enter it anyway. Enjoy

Made for Oculus Quest 2 

Control Scheme

Snap turn/.Teleport - To Move

Grab and slot objects. - Trigger

Music from - audionautix.com
